lenders.name: Reesa & Cameron

lenders.occupational_info: Coach and Team Build,

lenders.loan_because: my small loan can make a difference.

lenders.loan_because: We need to help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a big firm. I learn employees how they can do there work safer and reduce injuries.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help someone who may be less fortunate than I am.  In hopes that I can help make a difference in their lives!

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: The notion of helping hardworking people start businesses that will help clothe and feed their family warms my heart.  Thank you Kiva!

lenders.name: Gerit
lenders.loan_because:
I have been travelling a lot in poor countries and was often overwhelmed by the vast problem of poverty which left me feeling quite hopeless. I read the book by Muhammad Yunus and for the first time I saw that there was a way to help the poorest. 
I'm glad I found this internet site to be able to do my small part in beating poverty in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure that the products we produce are safe to use for the customer.  This means lots of paper work, but it is not boring - actually sometimes a bit too exciting for my taste. :-)

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to share our resources. Micro-finance loans are an incredible way to create a more equitable world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language in Chile, to children and adults.

lenders.name: DeeDee
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to have your own business - I just want to help people.

lenders.name: Angela

lenders.name: Paulusie
lenders.loan_because:
I do not agree with billionaires around the world,  they make billions because of us the poor neither average livings.  $1,402,275 can be paid off in less than a second by a r rich man which makes millions from us. help me go pubic over this and get it paid OFF. Thanks

Paulusie

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: ...it would be a sin not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lenders.name: Bilal
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the cause of microfinance and entrepreneurship on all faces of the globe.

lenders.loan_because: I want to see what people can do with my money.

lenders.name: Mel

lenders.name: Joanne

lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching QiGong and Tai Chi - I'm doing my part to make this world healthier!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's wonderful that so little can make such a difference, a truth that I need to be reminded of daily.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: i think this is a fantastic opportunity to help people that are less fortunate than me and have not been given the same opportunities that I have had to succeed within my work.
lenders.occupational_info: I help with the import/exporting of goods within Australia.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to gain the same sorts of opportunities as I'm lucky enough to have available to me, and the same degree of respect from my fellow human.

lenders.name: Doug and Patricia
lenders.loan_because: We've been given a second chance at life and would like to help others.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because:
the more goodness you put into the world, the better the world will be for everyone.

I also greatly admire those who are taking big steps to make life better for their families.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a real difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children reach their highest potential

lenders.name: Angie Nikoleychuk
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a perfect way to help others so that they can continue to help themselves long into the future. Success is worthless unless you can share it with others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I write offline and online content for businesses in a variety of industries. In addition to writing, I also enjoy SEO, SM, branding, business,  and marketing. 

I'm well-known for my information obsession, bookmarking addiction, and for being a passionate (coffee) bean brat.

Outside of work, I'm a single mom who enjoys music performance, crafting, the outdoors, and any other creative outlet I can get my hands on.

lenders.name: Takao
lenders.loan_because: This excellent system helps me to find out someone who really needs "support".
lenders.occupational_info: Working at worldwide PC manufacturer, am responsible for demand generation via online and social media marketing.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: it is more empowering to the recipient than just giving a handout.  They grow and get better at what they do.  If they make a mistake they will learn from it.  It is a good feeling to know you can give someone a helping hand in some small way.

lenders.name: Susy
lenders.loan_because: I want to effect change in developing nations.  I believe that these individuals have the intelligence, creativity and business sense to ensure the happiness of themselves and their families and I would like to be a part of this change.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a professional organisation, which acts on behalf of nursery and garden owners across Australia.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I am a final year student and my parents are no more  now.I dont have anybody to pay my school fees again,so am seeking for help in order to pay my school fees before am thrown out of school.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I like to help hard working people

lenders.name: Liana
lenders.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed in so many ways and I believe it is important to give back to others less fortunate.  We are Americans who live overseas and have traveled to many of the countries that are represented on the site and I have seen firsthand the dire situations these people live in.  My heart breaks for them and I want to help them in some way.
lenders.occupational_info: Our giving is an extension of the love and blessings we have been showered with from God.

lenders.name: Sorita
lenders.loan_because: Every little helps! It is an honor to help those who are helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an analyst at an investment bank.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: I care. I want people to achieve their dreams and in turn pay it forward to others.

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor of human development & family studies in Connecticut (USA).

lenders.name: SONJA
lenders.loan_because: Because I can

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help others this way and teach my grandchildren the joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach eighth grade students at an inner city school. Most of our children are minorities, whose parents have never finished high school

lenders.name: John and Nina
lenders.loan_because: We believe in people!  Everyone deserves an opportunity to try to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Lani
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a case manager on a small reservation in rural New Mexico.

lenders.name: Xakzen
lenders.loan_because:
But He said to them, "You give them something to eat!" And they said, "We have no more than five loaves and two fish, unless perhaps we go and buy food for all these people."

lenders.name: aax4
lenders.occupational_info: http://fb.me/jimmyhan/

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The words of a hymn describe it best: "Because I have been given much, I too must give".
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students about physics, and study the physics of electrons inside various materials.

lenders.name: Cosby High School
lenders.loan_because: As a history teacher I am trying to help my students see a broader picture of the world. Kiva is the perfect organization to foster an understanding of the growing interdependence of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Cosby is a public high school, where teachers work with upwards of 125 teenage students'  everyday; trying to help them develop a sense of who they are and what they are capable of achieving if they put their minds to it. Kiva helps both the teachers and students see their sense of civic responsibility in the context of world issues, not just local ones.

lenders.name: Cyndee
lenders.loan_because: We're all connected and want the best for our families.  I loan, because I want the best for all children.
lenders.occupational_info: I support teachers with projects and lessons they provide our students.  I wish I could be a teacher and have great respect for the people with the gift of teaching. It's an honor working with them.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower others and help stop global poverty and hunger.

lenders.name: Jinu
lenders.loan_because: I really want my own allowance to help many people.

lenders.occupational_info: It's awesome!

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who's odds are stacked against them get on their feet.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizational leaders and their teams to bring out their best to create productive,  meaningful and satisfying work places.

lenders.name: Genna & Kevin
lenders.loan_because: ...everyone deserves an opportunity to work and make themselves and the world better.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a couple -- one of us studies preserving history and the other is a writer.

lenders.name: Gudbrand
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help ordinary people realising their talent and skills and improving their own lives with their own effort.

lenders.name: Betsi
lenders.loan_because: ...even on government income, I am wealthier than so many people in this world. I want to help. ♥

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: of my belief that everyone, regardless of where they live, deserves a chance to be be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: The Lord has given us many gifts.  It is our job to understand how to best use them to make a positive difference in the world.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to other people's lives, by giving them the power to make changes themselves.  To me, providing someone with a loan, and with the encouragement to follow their dreams, is giving them the opportunity to make a difference to their own lives and to their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as a teaching assistant and classroom supervisor in schools, mainly with young children aged from 0-11.  I am aiming to train as a Lower Primary teacher next year.  I believe that every human being should have the right to access education, and so I am particularly interested in lending to individuals who are looking for funding to improve their businesses in order to afford funding for their children's education, or to groups which have an educational focus, especially for young people in developing countries.

lenders.name: D Roger Maves
lenders.loan_because:
I've been an entrepreneur all my life and realize how important it can be to get a little help from a friend.
I enjoy giving back and seeing others directly benefit from it.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software (websites) for real estate brokers and agents which help them to market themselves to their prospects.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself. I want to give back to the world some of what I have been blessed enough to receive myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and train their pet dogs, so that they can achieve a more pleasurable relationship. I help keep dogs in their homes through training, as they are not as likely to be relinquished to shelters if they are well behaved and properly cared for.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a marketing firm that serves attorneys and law firms nationwide.

lenders.occupational_info: My team works to improve Google Maps.

lenders.name: Rotary Club of Gibsons
lenders.loan_because: It is the Right Thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Motto is: Service above Self.  Our Creed is:  Is it the Truth - Will it benefit all concerned - Will it build goodwill and fellowship - Is it fair to all.

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because: just a little bit of help can make big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I beleive that much of the unrest in the world occurs because the powerful silence the voices of the people in whatever way will work.  In my mind keeping people in poverty is the greatest silencer of all.  When I help someone out of poverty I help them find their voice.  And once a person finds her or his voice they have a say in what happens to them.  They become free.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a research hospital.  My job is to review research projects and make determinations concering the safety and ethics of clinical research projects.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: Every day I read so many stories about people around the world who are struggling... I decided it was time to do my part to help.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help others -- by giving them a way to help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: Karen and I are hard working and have 2 children. I work in maintenance and Karen works for IBM.

lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I know how important trust and a little cash is to run a business.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing stuff on and with the Internets

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think each individual person can make a change in the world one step and one day at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sports management to ensure that student-athletes have the materials, instruction and opportunities to perform at their best on the playing field and in the classroom.

lenders.name: Mathias
lenders.loan_because: It will help people to understand and benefit of free market economy. It is a fair business for both sides.

lenders.name: Chetan
lenders.loan_because: Stimulating people and promoting entrepreneurship, more businesses provides more jobs.
lenders.occupational_info: An online TV listings site

lenders.name: Benton Jr High Economics
lenders.loan_because: My 9th grade Economics classes chose KIVA as a community service work.  It is exciting to see how individuals can make a difference in so many lives.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: We really can change the world.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.occupational_info: To help promote peace, compassion, and goodwill

lenders.name: Rafael
lenders.loan_because: Not all of us are lucky enough to live in rich modern countries.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world beyond my door.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The way to provide aid is to initially give grants, and later to promote trade. Microfinancing handles both.
lenders.occupational_info: IT in Financial Services.

lenders.name: Aleks
lenders.loan_because: I am excited my (small) gift will have a huge impact in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an executive administrator in a provessional services firm.  I support a vice chairman both in his professional and personal life.

lenders.name: Richard Hyatt
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs create growth opportunities for countries
lenders.occupational_info: CTO and Co-Founder of BlueCat Networks

lenders.name: Shirl & Lib
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do to make this world a better place for everyone!

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed my family's business with success & I need to share with people who are trying to make a life.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell to small stores in a 60 mile radius of my home.  They are all family owned.  Everybody works hard for their family.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to over 35 countries and have seen what poverty is really like and believe that the small contributions that are made by people on Kiva can and will make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documents that teach people how to use computers.

lenders.name: Pat Patterson
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a sustainable way. As it's repaid, the money I put into Kiva can be relent again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I help developers understand how salesforce.com's cloud technologies can help solve real business problems.

lenders.name: Polly
lenders.loan_because: I own a small business, and I want other women around the world to be able to own businesses also.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies create reports to analyze their businesses--where the overdue accounts are, which items are most profitable, etc.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: ENABLE ME TO RENT A SHOP FOR MY GALLARY AND ALSO HELP OPHANS  IN TEACHING THEM HOW TO MAKE CRAFT
lenders.occupational_info: I MAKE PHOTO FRAMES, CALABASH FLOWER POT, AFRICAN CLOCKS

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.occupational_info:
Tampa real estate resource providing extensive property search and MLS search listings Free. Serving Tampa and St. Petersburg Real Estate search and Hillsborough and Pinellas Counties
One stop source for Tampa Real Estate, new homes for sale in Tampa FL, and up-to-date MLS listings in Florida.

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: Actually my wife set this loan up as a birthday present to me because she knows how much I want to bless other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public school teacher.  I teach science and social studies to 8th grade students.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: “...Every human is fated to have one moment in their lives in which they can change their own destiny.”

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on developing portable diagnostic tools for global health applications.

lenders.name: Harm
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people and make them happy. By funding their needs with a loan, I am able to. If every living soul would help his neighbour, how wonderfull would this planet be?
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching math is a worldly known occupation. I teach kids/adults from the age of 12 till 20. Furthermore I would describe myself as an observer of the world and study the history of the european continent.

lenders.name: Quito the bandito
lenders.loan_because: Individuals featured on Kiva are harding working, responsible people.  Their desire to improve their lives and the lives of their families is great so why not help them achieve their goal?

lenders.name: Risa
lenders.loan_because: I give the guy on the corner $25 and he's back there the next day; I loan Kiva $25 and someone learns how to fish. It's not a tough call.

lenders.name: Salt Lake Outreach
lenders.loan_because: we care.
